FuncDef: Ifentropy-labelis configured, the Entropy label and Entropy Label Indicator is inserted on packets for which at least one LSP in the stack for the far-end of the LDP or RSVP tunnel used by an IGP or BGP shortcut has advertised entropy-label-capability. If the tunnel is of type RSVP, thenentropy-labelmust also have been enabled underconfig>router>mplsorconfig>router>mpls>lsp.
